title: Beach villa at Boossa
details:
This three bed, three bath villa sits directly on the beach at Boossa near Galle.  Currently run as a holiday let it is offered for sale fully-furnished and equipped.

The accommodation comprises three bedrooms each with bathroom, large living and dining areas, kitchen and outside terrace.  All rooms are air-conditioned. Outside there is a swimming pool and a separate pavilion perfect for lounging or al-fresco dining.  The large garden which contains several coconut palms,  opens directly on to the beach.

The villa is equipped with hot water, store rooms, a laundry and staff facilities.
